articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: We are a group of students and faculty at Swarthmore College who regularly work on #TidyTuesday data visualizations
articles.contents: For more information on how to join us, please reach out to Prof Amanda Luby!

articles.title: Contributors
articles.contents:
We are a group of students and faculty at Swarthmore College who regularly work on #TidyTuesday and other data visualizations. For more information on how to join us, please reach out to Prof Amanda Luby!
Spring 2021
Elizabeth Shin ’22 | Neuroscience, Pre-Med
Fun Fact: Aside from my academic interests in biomedical research and data visualization, I’ve picked up fencing and archery at Swarthmore! Feel free to check out my LinkedIn and GitHub!
Tolga Atabas ’23 | Mathematics, minor in Computer Science and Arabic
Quinn Basewitz ’23 | Mathematics with Emphasis in Statistics, Computer Science
Fun Fact: I’m on the field hockey and track teams at Swarthmore, along with being involved in Kehilah and Chorus! Lately, I’ve been enjoying cooking new vegetarian recipes!
Brooke Coneeny ’23 | Mathematics with Emphasis in Statistics, Computer Science
Fun Fact: I play on the varsity softball team here at Swarthmore and I am super interested in sports analytics, especially involving softball and baseball
Sherry Huang ’23 | Mathematics with Emphasis in Statistics, minor in Computer Science
Sydney Levy ’23 |
Atesh Camurdan ’24 | Mathematics with Emphasis in Statistics, Computer Science
Fun Fact: I am also taking Chinese and Music courses at Swat. I am an aspiring music composer, and will be attending the Atlantic Music Festival this summer as a composer!
